scripts.clean: rm -rf lambdas/dist && (cd lambdas/src/init && rm -rf node_modules dist) && (cd lambdas/src/post-processor  && rm -rf node_modules dist) && (cd lambdas/src/worker && rm -rf node_modules dist) && mkdir lambdas/dist && (cd lambdas/dist && touch init.zip && touch post-processor.zip && touch worker.zip)
scripts.install-all: npm i && (cd lambdas/src/init && npm i) && (cd lambdas/src/post-processor && npm i) && (cd lambdas/src/worker && npm i)
scripts.build: npm i && (cd lambdas/src/init && npm run build) && (cd lambdas/src/post-processor && npm run build) && (cd lambdas/src/worker && npm run build)
